epigraph.para: Hate begets hate, and violence creates violence. For some, there is no truth more vital than this.

section.title: Setting the Scene
section.para: Generations before the first crusading parties of Abadar came to found the nation of &nation_name;, the smaller, less prosperous kingdom of &old_nation_name; laid claim to the valley of &valley_name;. Content to utilize the valley's rich land to sustain themselves, the citizens of &old_nation_name; shared little contact with the neighboring desert kingdom of &desert_kingdom;, and their king held few ambitions for expansion. This isolationism would prove to be their undoing.

While the people of &old_nation_name; happily labored within their small towns and hamlets, barbarian nomads from the desert came to &valley_name; through the mountains. With these barbarians came a young chieftan known as &barb_king;.
